qas.question: What country was Burma involved with in 2015

answers.text: Armed conflict between ethnic Chinese rebels and the Myanmar Armed Forces

qas.question: Were there any refuges that resulted from the Burmese conflict in 2015?

answers.text: The conflict had forced 40,000 to 50,000 civilians to flee their homes and seek shelter

qas.question: What was the government of China accused of during the Kokang offensive ?

answers.text: China was accused of giving military assistance to the ethnic Chinese rebels.

qas.question: Is China an affect on the government in Burma ?

answers.text: Burmese officials have been historically 'manipulated' and pressured by the communist Chinese

qas.question: To what benefit of China has its interest in the Burmese government brought about ?

answers.text: creating a Chinese satellite state in Southeast Asia

context: <a0_0>Armed conflict between ethnic Chinese rebels and the Myanmar Armed Forces<a0_0/> have resulted in the Kokang offensive in February 2015. <a1_0>The conflict had forced 40,000 to 50,000 civilians to flee their homes and seek shelter<a1_0/> on the Chinese side of the border. During the incident the government of <a2_0>China was accused of giving military assistance to the ethnic Chinese rebels.<a2_0/> <a3_0>Burmese officials have been historically 'manipulated' and pressured by the communist Chinese<a3_0/> government throughout Burmese modern history to create closer and binding ties with China, <a4_0>creating a Chinese satellite state in Southeast Asia<a4_0/>.
